description: This file is the main entry point for a Flutter-based notes application. It handles application startup, configuration loading, Supabase initialization, splash/error screens, and main app widget setup.

classes.name: AppBootstrapResult
classes.description: Represents the result of the asynchronous app bootstrap process, indicating success or failure and error message if any.

classes.name: _SplashScreen
classes.description: Loading screen widget shown during app initialization.

classes.name: _ErrorScreen
classes.description: Error screen widget displayed if app initialization fails, showing error details and a retry button.

classes.name: NotesApp
classes.description: Main widget for the notes application, setting up providers and MaterialApp.

classes.name: NotesHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget that serves as the main interface of the notes app, including note creation, editing, deletion, and category filtering.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main entrypoint that initializes Flutter, loads environment variables, initializes Supabase, and starts the app.

methods.name: _bootstrapApp
methods.description: Performs asynchronous startup tasks: loading environment variables and initializing Supabase, returning success or error.
